ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MESSENGER MAG Cruise Phase Data, Resolutions up to 20Hz
ResourceHeader.Description:
This MESSENGER/MAG data set contains cruise-phase
magnetic field vectors in RTN coordinates at time resolutions typically
of 0.5s or 1.0s and sometimes as fine as 0.05s.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Acknowledge the Experiment Scientist, Brian
Anderson of JHU_APL, and the organization from which the data were
 acquired.

NumericalData.Caveats:

likely to have data quality issues.
